title: NACC Uniform Data Set (UDS) – Initial Visit Packet, Form E1: Imaging/Labs
description:
NOTE: This form is to be completed by ADC or clinic staff.For additional 
clarification and examples, see UDS Coding Guidebook for Initial Visit
Packet, Form E1.Check only one box per response category.

neur_image.title: Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC:

CTFLM.title: 1A Computed tomography, film
CTFLM.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
          available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
          question should be coded "No".

CTDIG.title: 1B Computed tomography, digital image
CTDIG.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
          available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
          question should be coded "No".

MRI1FLM.title: 2A Magnetic resonance imaging – Clinical study, film
MRI1FLM.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
              available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
              question should be coded "No".

MRI1DIG.title: 2B Magnetic resonance imaging – Clinical study, digital image
MRI1DIG.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
              available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
              question should be coded "No".

MRI2FLM.title: 3A Magnetic resonance imaging – Research study/structural, film
MRI2FLM.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
              available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
              question should be coded "No".

MRI2DIG.title: 3B Magnetic resonance imaging – Research study/structural, digital image
MRI2DIG.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
              available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
              question should be coded "No".

MRI3FLM.title: 4A Magnetic resonance imaging – Research study/functional, film
MRI3FLM.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
          available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
          question should be coded "No".

MRI3DIG.title: 4B Magnetic resonance imaging – Research study/functional, digital image
MRI3DIG.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
          available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
          question should be coded "No".

MRISPFLM.title: 5A Magnetic resonance spectroscopy, film
MRISPFLM.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
          available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
          question should be coded "No".

MRISPDIG.title: 5B Magnetic resonance spectroscopy, digital image
MRISPDIG.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
          available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
          question should be coded "No".

SPECTFLM.title: 6A SPECT, film
SPECTFLM.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
          available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
          question should be coded "No".

SPECTDIG.title: 6B SPECT, digital image
SPECTDIG.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
          available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
          question should be coded "No".

PETFLM.title: 7A PET, film
PETFLM.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
          available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
          question should be coded "No".

PETDIG.title: 7B PET, digital image
PETDIG.comment:
Imaging (of the subject’s head) available at your ADC. If data are not
          available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
          question should be coded "No".

DNA.title: 8 DNA
DNA.comment:
Specimens available at your ADC. If specimen and/or data are not
      available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
      question should be coded "No".

CSFANTEM.title: 9 Cerebrospinal fluid – ante-mortem
CSFANTEM.comment:
Specimens available at your ADC. If specimen and/or data are not
      available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
      question should be coded "No".

SERUM.title: 10 Serum/plasma
SERUM.comment:
Specimens available at your ADC. If specimen and/or data are not
      available to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this
      question should be coded "No".

APOE.title: 11 APOE genotype collected
APOE.comment: Comment If the subject’s APOE genotype (data) is not accessible to your Center researchers within a few hours, then this question should be coded "No".
